label: A3B3C2_hP16_187_jk_jk_ak-001
title: Cr-233 Quasi-One-Dimensional Superconductor (K$_{2}$Cr$_{3}$As$_{3}$) Structure
comments:
Cr-233 designates a class of structures of the form A$_{2}$B$_{2}$As$_{3}$, where the ``A'' atoms form one-dimensional chains.  Several of these compounds have been found to superconduct at temperatures on the order of 5-10K. 
 The ICSD entry is for Rb$_{2}$Mo$_{3}$As$_{3}$ from (Zhao, 2020). The ICSD entry lists that as the prototype, but (Bao, 2015) obviously found K$_{2}$Cr$_{3}$As$_{3}$ earlier, so we continue using it as our prototype.
